org.prebake.service.plan
Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
  org.prebake.service.plan.Recipe

@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object

A plan to build a set of products by preparing some initial ingredients, that then allows us to prepare more complicated ingredients.

We could represent a recipe as the post ordering of the spanning forest of the plan graph.

But we want to allow products to be built in parallel where there is no overlap between their inputs and outputs. So we represent a recipe as a list of ingredients that need to be made first, and each ingredient points to other ingredients that need this ingredient. Each ingredient has a count of ingredients that link to it that need to be made first.

Use the cook method to dispatch ingredients to sous-chefs. A sous-chef can report back by calling the whenDone function.

If all goes well, you will end up with a cake.
